sections.title: Welcome to Paws on the Move!
sections.subtitle: Professional Dog Walking & Pet Care Services
sections.name: hero-section
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Join us and explore the joy of professional dog walking and specialized pet care services. Let's keep those tails wagging!

images.name: happy-dog-walk
images.description: A vibrant image showing a happy dog playing in a park with a dog walker.

sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: Passionate About Pets
sections.name: about-us-section
sections.label: About
sections.content: **Paws on the Move** is more than just a dog walking service; it's a community for pet lovers. Founded in 2015, we pride ourselves on trusted, reliable care tailored to fit your pet’s needs. Whether it's a simple walk or specialized attention, we are here to help.

images.name: founder-photo
images.description: A friendly photo of our founder, a pet enthusiast with a love for all four-legged friends.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Tailored Care for Every Need
sections.name: services-section
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
We offer a range of services to suit every lifestyle:

- **Daily Dog Walks**: Keep your pup happy and healthy!

- **Weekend Adventure Hikes**: Perfect for energetic dogs!

- **Kitty Visits**: Because felines need love too.

- **Pet Sitting**: Trusted care while you're away.

images.name: dog-walking-service
images.description: Service photo showing a dog walker and several happy dogs on a trail.
